title: Chhaava
description: "Chhaava" is a 2025 Indian Hindi-language historical action film directed by Laxman Utekar, featuring Vicky Kaushal as Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, the Maratha king. The film also stars Rashmika Mandanna and Akshaye Khanna in pivotal roles. It is an adaptation of the Marathi novel "Chhava" by Shivaji Sawant.
